rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective directly modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment reports historical numbers factually without using high-potency verbs or potent metaphors.
The segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
The segment reports historical cases and deaths but lacks explicit calming language.
No bare negation or statement of absence/unlikelihood.
Reports historical impact (fatalities), not capabilities or preparedness.
Reports counts of infections and fatalities using standard verbs: "has caused 863 human infections... 455 were fatal".
